collectible.title: Cool Glasses
collectible.subtitle: L337 af
collectible.text: Pixel sunglasses that can only be worn by pro gamers. Wearing them as a non-pro gamer is a scrub move. (⌐■_■)

collectible.title: Creepy Pasta
collectible.subtitle: Was it worth it?
collectible.text: A plate of spaghetti with an eyeball on it. Don't worry though, it's fake... probably...
